description: Current System Security Plan (SSP) with all required sections completed, including system information, authorization details, and approval signatures
Risk Assessment Policy and Procedures documentation addressing purpose, scope, roles, responsibilities, and compliance requirements (RA-1)
Security categorization documentation with FIPS 199 analysis and supporting rationale, including authorizing official approval (RA-2)
Current risk assessment report documenting threats, vulnerabilities, likelihood and magnitude of harm, and impact to individuals from PII processing (RA-3)
Supply chain risk assessment documentation for systems, components, and services, including update frequency and significant change triggers (RA-3(1))
Vulnerability scan reports from the past 12 months for operating systems, infrastructure, web applications, APIs, and databases (RA-5)
Annual independent assessor vulnerability scan reports for operating systems/infrastructure, web applications, and databases (RA-5)
Plan of Action and Milestones (POA&M) documenting all open vulnerabilities with risk ratings, remediation timelines, and status tracking (RA-5)
Evidence of vulnerability scanner updates within 24 hours prior to scans, including update logs or configuration records (RA-5(2))
Vulnerability scanning coverage documentation defining breadth and depth of scanning across system components (RA-5(3))
Procedures and evidence for reviewing discoverable system information and taking corrective actions (RA-5(4))
Privileged access authorization documentation for authenticated vulnerability scanning activities (RA-5(5))
Historic audit log review documentation for high or critical vulnerability findings to determine prior exploitation (RA-5(8))
Public vulnerability disclosure program documentation, including reporting channel details and authorization language (RA-5(11))
Risk response documentation showing how findings from security assessments, monitoring, and audits are addressed in accordance with organizational risk tolerance (RA-7)
Criticality analysis documentation identifying critical system components, functions, and services at key decision points in the system development life cycle (RA-9)
FedRAMP authorization package documentation including authorization type (JAB or Agency) and FedRAMP Package ID
FIPS 199 categorization documentation and FIPS PUB 199 Level determination (SSP Appendix K)
Digital Identity Level (DIL) determination documentation (SSP Appendix E)
Separation of duties matrix documenting role assignments for privileged functions including admin additions/removals and policy enforcement
